description: Defines data classes for recipes and recipe lists, used in serialization/deserialization of recipe data in an Android application.

classes.name: Recipe
classes.description: A data class representing a recipe with properties such as id, title, description, image, tags, ingredients, steps, duration, and difficulty. Implements Serializable for passing between components.

classes.name: RecipeList
classes.description: A data class representing a list of recipes, mainly used for JSON parsing.
